Jargon Term: You will have to stay OFF this medication until your next endoscopy.
Please speak with your cardiologist about restarting the darbigatran.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - Specialist appointment

Jargon Term: atrial fibrillation with a rapid heart beat

STOP Dabigatran. This medication contributed to your bleeding. You will need to stay off this medication until you have an EGD in 2 weeks. Thereafter, you should talk to your primary provider and cardiologist about when to restart this or other anti-coagulation.
START Clonazepam 0.5 mg by mouth twice daily and Clonazepam 1 mg at night daily
START Risperidone 2 mg by mouth at night daily
INCREASED Metoprolol XL to 150 mg once daily - 100 mg XL Daily and 50 mg XL daily

Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - Specialist appointment
